name: oxker
description: Terminal User Interface (TUI) to view & control docker containers

repo.name: oxker
repo.description: A simple tui to view & control docker containers

readme.summary: Excellent installation options and configuration documentation, but lacks quick-start examples and troubleshooting guidance.
readme.top_issue: No basic usage example showing what happens after running 'oxker' - new users don't see a concrete workflow before installation

injection_risks.description: The Docker::connect_with_socket function is called with user-controlled input (host), but it does not seem to be directly vulnerable to injection attacks. However, the lack of validation on this input could potentially lead to issues.

critical_findings: Lack of input validation in the read_docker_host function
Potential exposure of sensitive information through the DOCKER_HOST environment variable
security.summary: The code has some security concerns, including potential injection risks and lack of input validation, but it does not appear to have any critical vulnerabilities.

common_complaints: Docker daemon connectivity issues across platforms (Windows, Linux, macOS)
Performance problems (slow log parsing causing UI stalls)
Platform-specific bugs (Windows config defaults, macOS test failures, Debian build failures)
UI/UX friction (actions pane requires mouse, keyboard navigation awkward)
praise_themes: Feature requests are constructive and detailed
Community engaged with specific use cases (Podman support, XDG config, network monitoring)
sentiment.summary: Active community with moderate engagement, but platform compatibility issues and performance problems are causing user frustration; maintainers are responding but some critical bugs remain unresolved.

red_flags: Occasional lack of detail in explanations
communication.summary: The maintainer is generally responsive but could improve clarity and provide more detailed technical explanations.

concerns: No commits in past 6 months despite last commit being from September 2025
22 open issues with no recent activity or resolution
No closed issues in past 6 months indicating no bug fixes or maintenance
No merged PRs in past 6 months showing no feature development or community contributions
No active contributors in past 6 months
Unknown last release date suggests release cycle has stalled
maintenance.summary: The oxker project appears abandoned with no maintenance activity for at least 3+ months, unresolved open issues, and no community engagement.

changelog.summary: The changelog effectively marks breaking changes and categorizes features, but lacks migration guides and seems incomplete.

governance.summary: The documentation lacks a succession plan and contributor ladder, indicating high bus factor risk.

project_metrics.description: A simple tui to view & control docker containers

analysis_summary.doc_summary: The documentation is generally well-structured and informative, but lacks a clear quick start guide and troubleshooting section.
concerns: Docs: Lack of a dedicated troubleshooting section
Community: bug with oxker not starting
Communication: Occasional lack of detail in explanations
Governance: High bus factor risk identified
Security: Lack of input validation in the read_docker_host function
Security: Potential exposure of sensitive information through the DOCKER_HOST environment variable
High bus factor risk (99% from top contributor)
highlights: Moderate number of PRs and merged PRs in the past six months
Breaking changes clearly marked in changelog
